data.description:
Tarsus Pharmaceuticals, Inc. is focused on eyecare clinical research projects, and they are seeking a Clinical Development Intern. This role involves supporting the clinical development team, contributing to study protocol design, and engaging in various clinical development activities with a focus on image-processing and machine learning for ophthalmic images.


Responsibilities

  • Contribute to clinical development activities by developing image-processing machine learning models and pipelines for ophthalmic images, including feature extraction, segmentation, and automated grading using clinical scales
  • Using quantitative tools for image analysis (e.g. imageJ)
  • Employing Python and quantitative tools (e.g. ImageJ) to automate analysis tasks, increasing throughput, reproducibility, and consistency of imaging data
  • Assist with data review, perform data analysis, and prepare summaries, visualizations, instructional materials, and clinical study reports of computational findings
  • Conduct research on scientific topics, regulatory information, and/or competitive intelligence while collaborating with Clinical Trial Study Managers to assist with clinical operations projects
  • Interact with Clinical Trial Study Manager/Clinical Research Associate to gain exposure to the collaborative development process associated with executing a clinical trial
  • Take on clinical development and operations projects as needed to assist the team

Skills

  • Currently pursuing a graduate degree in Computer Science, System Design Engineering, Data Science, Electrical/Computer Engineering, Applied Mathematics, or related fields
  • Strong programming skills in Python, MATLAB, or similar languages
  • Experience with image processing and analysis libraries/tools (e.g. PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, OpenCV (cv2), NumPy, Matplotlib, Pandas)
  • Strong organizational, and communication skills
  • Strong analytical thinking, prioritization, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills
  • A willingness to try new things and voice thoughts, considerations, and concerns
  • Comfortable working both independently and collaboratively
  • Proficient on basic Microsoft suite computer programs such as Microsoft Excel, Word, and PowerPoint
  • Basic statistical knowledge

Benefits

  • Snacks and drinks
  • Occasional catered meals
  • Hybrid work environment
  • Lunch and learns
  • Development opportunities
  • Offsite volunteering
  • Company-wide social events

Company Overview

  • Tarsus (NASDAQ:TARS) is a biopharmaceutical company that applies proven science and new technology to revolutionize treatment for patients, starting with eye care. It was founded in 2017, and is headquartered in Irvine, California, USA, with a workforce of 201-500 employees. Its website is https://www.tarsusrx.com.
